fr.umlv.escape.front

Class FrontApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.front.FrontApplication

  • public class FrontApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    This class create and draw the window of the game. All renders operations are done in this class *

    • Method Detail

      • launchFrontApplication

        public void launchFrontApplication()
        Launch a window and managed all event received in it. This method draw all images in this window using the DisplayableMonitor.
